Su sueño es que este hogar crezca y les permita salir adelante a estos niños que provienen de familias tan golpeadas por grandes dificultades. Además espera mejorar poco a poco para que cada vez los niños se sientan más a gusto allí.
texts.en:
Luz Maria is 50 years old and has been performing a great social work for 18 years: operating a child care center where she cares for approximately 80 children. She gives them good care and a good education while their parents, the majority of whom have few economic resources, are at work. Since she started her child care center, it has grown a lot and this has allowed her to attend to more and more children. It allows her to provide society with a good quality of life. Because of the large number of children who attend, her 20-year-old daughter works with her so that her child care center can offer the highest-quality education possible. Despite the fact that she looks after a large number of children, Luz Maria performs a kind of community assistance with the area residents, so she doesn't have a lot of capital available. This is why she is looking for a loan to repair the roof of her child care center.

Her dream is that this home grows and allows these children to move forward, given that they come from families affected by great difficulties. She also hope to improve bit by bit so that bit by bit the children feel more comfortable there.

loans.use: to repair the roof of her child care center.

loans.name: Abake Group

texts.fr: Le groupe ABAKE est composé de trois personnes qui vivent dans la même maison au Bénin. C'est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Laurinda est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Laurinda est âgée de 27 ans et est mariée à un certain Dine. Le couple a un enfant, scolarisé, et à leur charge. Laurinda a peu fréquenté l’école. Laurinda vit ensemble avec son mari et son enfant. Le couple assure ensemble les divers besoins du ménage. Pour assurer ses différentes charges, Laurinda mène comme activité la vente des plateaux d’oeufs à son domicile. Laurinda exerce cette activité depuis cinq ans. Laurinda s’approvisionne dans sa région. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu, Laurinda sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe ABAKE, un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé. Ce prêt leur servira à rehausser le stock de ses produits et à augmenter leur clientèle.
texts.en:
The group ABAKE comprises three persons who live in the same house in Benin. This is the first time this group has requested financial aid from ALIDé to raise the level of their work. The group's representative, Laurinda, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. She is 27 years old and married to a man named Dine. The couple have one child in school and in their care. She has had little schooling. She lives together with her husband and child. The couple jointly ensure that the diverse household needs are met. 

To cover her different expenses, Laurinda has a business selling trays of eggs from home. She has been in this business for five years. She gets her supplies from her region.

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her sales and revenues, Laurinda is requesting, along with the other members of the group ABAKE, an initial loan from ALIDé. This loan will be used to boost her stock of products and to grow her customer base.

loans.use: to purchase trays of eggs to sell from home

loans.name: Missimahu Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MISSIMAHU est composé de trois personnes qui vivent dans la même maison au Bénin. C'est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Emilienne est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Emilienne est âgée de 37 ans et est mariée à un menuisier du nom de Calixte. Le couple a quatre enfants, dont certains scolarisés, et dont restent à leur charge. Emilienne n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Emilienne vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les divers besoins du ménage. Pour assurer ses différentes charges, Emilienne mène comme activité la vente des jus de citron et de bouillie à son domicile. Emilienne exerce cette activité depuis une dizaine d’années. Emilienne s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu, Emilienne sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MISSIMAHU, un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé. Ce prêt leur servira à rehausser le stock de ses produits et à augmenter leur clientèle
texts.en:
The group MISSIMAHU comprises three persons who live in the same house in Benin. This is the first time this group has requested financial aid from ALIDé to raise the level of their work. The group's representative, Emilienne, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. She is 37 years old and married to a furniture maker named Calixte. The couple have four children, not all in school but all remain in their care. She did not attend school. She lives together with her husband and children. The couple jointly ensure that the diverse household needs are met. 

To cover her different expenses, Emilienne has a business selling lime juice and porridge out of her home. She has been in this business for about ten years. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin.

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her sales and revenues, Emilienne is requesting, along with the other members of the group MISSIMAHU, an initial loan from ALIDé. This loan will be used to boost her stock of products and to grow her customer base.

loans.use: to purchase lime juice, sugar, and corn

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies in order to deliver his orders with good quality products

loans.name: Huathan

texts.en:
Mr. Huathan is 55 years old. He lives with his wife and youngest son in a small house in the western province of Mongolia. His wife is unemployed and stays at home. His youngest son helps in his father's business. 

Mr. Huathan manages two kinds of business. First, he exports ready-made clothes to Kazakstan. The working capital of the business is 3,000,000 MNT. He conducts only the financial management of this business; his son manages sales. For the second business, he has been planting organic vegetables since this year. He successfully plants organic cucumbers and organic tomatoes in a greenhouse. Now he wants to improve his planting by expanding his fields. 

He requests a 5,000,000 MNT loan. With 3,000,000 MNT he will buy a new field. With the rest of the loan he will purchase more clothes. Mr Huathan is a very sensitive businessman. He says, "I am happy to my son is starting to manage the business now that he is becoming an adult."

loans.use: To buy a new field and to purchase more clothes

loans.name: Leydi Crystal

texts.es:
La señora Leydi solicita un crédito para los gastos escolares de sus dos hijos que empezaran el siclo escolar. Les esta haciendo falta los uniformes y útiles escolares, comprende que la educación es lo mas importante para que sus hijos puedan triunfar en la vida.
La señora Leydi y su esposo trabajan en una maquiladora desde has ya mas de ocho años, siendo este el ingreso y con el cual planean pagar el crédito.
Desean que sus hijos tengan la educación necesaria, ya que es lo que les puede ofrecer para que tengan una vida mejor en el futuro.
texts.en:
Sra. Leydi is applying for a loan that she will use to pay her children's school expenses.  The new school year is about to start and her two children need uniforms, school supplies, etc.  She knows that a good education is key to getting ahead in life.
Sra. Leydi and her husband have worked at local factories for more than eight years.  They will repay the loan with income from their jobs.  
They want their children to have a good education because providing one is how they can best ensure that their childen have bright futures.

loans.use: to pay her children's school expenses.

loans.name: Dieu Peut Tout Group

texts.fr: Le groupe DIEU PEUT TOUT est formé de trois personnes qui résident dans la même agglomération et exercent des activités génératrices de revenus. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Rollande Akuevi est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Rollande Akuevi est mariée à un maçon du nom de Bienvenu et est mère de deux enfants. Parmi les deux enfants, un est scolarisé. Tous les deux enfants vivent avec leurs parents. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges du ménage. Rollande Akuevi n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Il y a huit ans environs que Rollande Akuevi mène comme activité la vente de nourriture (pâte de maïs fermenté accompagné de sauce) de façon ambulante. Rollande Akuevi s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. La demande de sa clientèle devient de plus en plus grande et compte tenu de ses moyens limités, Rollande Akuevi n'arrive plus à bien répondre à leurs exigences. Eu égard à cela et compte tenu de leurs ressources limitées, Rollande Akuevi et les autres membres du groupe DIEU PEUT TOUT sollicitent ensemble un  deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The group DIEU PEUT TOUT comprises three persons who reside in the same 'agglomération' and who have revenue-generating businesses. The group's representative, Rollande Akuevi, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. This is the second time this group has requested financial support from ALIDé with the aim of raising the level of their business. 

Rollande Akuevi is married to a mason named Bienvenu and is the mother of two children, of whom one is in school. Both live with their parents. The couple jointly ensure that the diverse household expenses are covered.

Rollande Akuevi did not attend school. For about eight years, she has had a business selling food (fermented polenta served with sauce) from door to door. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. 

Customer demand is larger and larger, and given her limited means, Rollande Akuevi can no longer respond well to their requirements. In this regard and due to their limited resources, Rollande Akuevi and the other members of the group DIEU PEUT TOUT are requesting a second loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: to purchase corn and condiments

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz Marina es una persona que a pesar de las grandes dificultades que se le han presentado en la vida ha logrado salir adelante luchando todos los días para que en su hogar puedan tener una buena calidad de vida. Madre soltera cabeza de familia, Luz Marina tiene 2 hijos a quienes su padre abandonó sin hacer algún apoyo económico para su sostenimiento, lo que ha hecho que la situación económica en su hogar siempre sea difícil. Para generar los ingresos que se requieren en su hogar, tiene un taller de confección que montó con unas máquinas básicas y que gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos ha logrado tener muy buenas ventas y venir creciendo poco a poco. Con los ingresos de su taller de confección, sus 2 hijos ahora pueden acceder a una educación de buena calidad, y el mayor de estos 2 tiene la posibilidad de asistir a la universidad. En busca de responder a un gran pedido que tiene por parte de uno de sus clientes, Luz Marina busca un préstamo para comprar insumos como cremalleras, hilos, plástico, cuero, entre otros más y fabricar los grandes pedidos que tiene.

Su sueño es que este taller le siga permitiendo brindarles a sus 2 hijos acceso a una educación de buena calidad y en un futuro poder verlos graduarse de la universidad.
texts.en:
Luz Marina is a person who, despite the great difficulties that have presented themselves in her life, has been able to move forward fighting every day so that she can have a good quality of life in her home. A single mother and head of the household, Luz Marina has two children, whose father abandoned them without offering any financial help to sustain them. It has always made the economic situation in their home difficult. To generate the income that the household requires, she has a sewing shop that she started with some basic machines and with which, thanks to the good quality of her products, she has had good sales and has been growing little by little. With the income from her sewing shop, her two children now have access to a high-quality education, and the older of the two has the possibility of attending university. 

So that she can respond to a large order from one of her customers, Luz Marina is looking for a loan to buy supplies like zippers, thread, plastic, and leather among other things and to fill the large orders she has. Her dream is that this workshop continues to allow her to give her children access to a high-quality education and in the future to see them graduate from university.

loans.use: to buy supplies like zippers, thread, plastic, and leather, among other things and to fill the large orders that she has.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing like pajamas, blouses, and jeans, among others, and to respond to a large order that she has from a customer.

loans.name: Yury Fernanda

texts.es:
Yury se encuentra casada y tiene un hijo de 7 años de edad, y debido a que los ingresos que generaba su esposo no eran suficientes para poder sostener los gastos de su hogar, decidió comenzar a generar ingresos para su hogar para poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Fue buscando oportunidades de generar ingresos que se encontró con un distribuidor de productos de panadería que le enseñó la actividad y ahora ella tiene su propio negocio de distribución de dulces y galletería. Gracias a este negocio, ahora su hijo puede acceder a una educación de buena calidad y las dificultades económicas en su hogar se han venido superando poco a poco. Hace ya 3 años que tiene su negocio y gracias al esfuerzo que hace diariamente ha logrado crecer considerablemente, tanto que ahora tiene la oportunidad de distribuir sus productos hacia diferentes municipios, y esto le da la oportunidad de mejorar las condiciones económicas en su hogar. Debido a que su negocio ha crecido tanto, Yury ahora requiere de una estantería para ubicar sus productos, pero como no cuenta con el capital suficiente para esto, busca un préstamo que le permita comprar una estantería y poder ubicar sus productos de manera más adecuada.

Su sueño es que su familia logre salir adelante y pueda superar todas las adversidades que se le han presentado en la vida.
texts.en:
Yury is married and has a seven-year-old son. Because the income her husband generated wasn't enough to support their household expenses, she decided to start to generate income for their household, in order to improve her family's quality of life. 

She started looking for opportunities to generate income, which she found with a distributor of bakery products who taught her the business. Now she has her own business distributing sweets and cookies. 

Thanks to this business, her son can now have access to good quality education, and the financial difficulties in her home have been overcome, little by little. 

She has had her business for three years now, and thanks to the effort she makes every day, has seen it grow considerably. It has grown so much that now she has the chance to distribute her products to various towns. This gives her the opportunity to improve the financial circumstances of her household.

Because her business has grown so much, Yury now needs shelves for her products, but as she doesn't have enough working capital for this, she is seeking a loan that will allow her to buy shelves so that she can store her products in a more organized way. 

Her dream is for her family to achieve success, and be able to overcome all the hardships that have arisen for them in life.

loans.use: To buy shelves so that she can store her products in a more organized way.

loans.name: Luisa Fernanda

texts.es:
Luisa Fernanda es una joven emprendedora que al ver que en su hogar tenían grandes dificultades económicas decidió busca una manera de generar ingresos para su hogar, pero ya que no encontraba oportunidades laborales donde emplearse y generar ingresos decidió comenzar a comercializar productos de uso personal. Fue así como con un pequeño préstamo de un amigo suyo consiguió el capital para surtir unas primeras unidades de perfumes y con las ganancias de estas ventas reinvirtió para aumentar su capital y así poco a poco fue creciendo su negocio. Actualmente cuenta con una gran cantidad de clientes que le permiten tener ventas con las que genera ingresos para contribuir económicamente en su hogar, y esto le ha permitido brindarles a sus padres la posibilidad de gozar de una mejor calidad de vida. Buscando seguir creciendo con su negocio, Luisa Fernanda busca un préstamo para comprar productos de uso personal y seguir satisfaciendo los pedidos de sus clientes.

Su mayor sueño es que este negocio le permita contribuir aún más para que en su hogar las condiciones económicas mejoren y así sus padres puedan salir de tantas dificultades que tienen. Además aspira a que esta fuente de ingresos le permita seguir pagando sus estudios y en un futuro pueda progresar económicamente.
texts.en:
Luisa Fernanda is a young entrepreneur, who upon seeing that there were great financial difficulties in her home, decided to look for a way to generate income for her household. But as she wasn't finding opportunities for employment and generating income, she decided to begin selling personal products. 

This was how, with a small loan from a friend of hers, she secured the the working capital to stock a first few units of perfume. With the earnings from these, she reinvested in order to increase her working capital. In this way her business began to grow little by little. 

Currently she has a great number of customers; which allows her to have sales, through which she generates income to contribute financially to her household. This has allowed her to offer her parents the opportunity to enjoy a better quality of life. 

Looking to have her business keep growing, Luisa Fernanda is seeking a loan to buy personal products and continue satisfying her customers' orders.

Her greatest dream is that this business will allow her to contribute even more; so that the financial circumstances in her home improve, and her parents can overcome the many difficulties they have. In addition, her intention is that this source of income will allow her to keep paying for her studies, and in  the future progress financially.

loans.use: To buy personal products and continue satisfying her customers' orders.

loans.name: Lorenzo

Lorenzo is a new member of PMPC. In the future, Lorenzo hopes to expand his business.

Maria Lolita has been a member of PMPC for 1 year. In the future, Maria Lolita hopes to expand her business.

loans.name: Mamello

texts.en:
Mamello is applying for a loan to support her studies for a year at the Maharishi Institute. This is her story:

My name is Mamello, I am 21 years old and I am studying towards my Bachelor of Business Administration. My family consists of six members, including my daughter who is one year old. We live in Molapo, Soweto, and my mother is the only breadwinner in the family. I also live with my two cousins and my grandmother. 

Through getting a Kiva loan, I hope to realize my dreams of running my own business. I have a passion for marketing and communications, and I would love to open up my own public relations or consulting firm after graduation. I enjoy public speaking and reading motivational books and novels, and I also love exploring and traveling. I wish to be a role model for young girls, and give them an opportunity to liberate themselves and unleash their full potential.

video.title: Kiva Borrower Mamello from South Africa

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Portia

texts.en:
Portia is applying for a loan to support her studies for a year at the Maharishi Institute. This is her story:

My name is Portia and I am 21 years old. I am studying towards a Bachelor of Business Administration at The Maharishi Institute, and I am from a small township called Emzinoni in Bethal. 

My father, who was the sole breadwinner in our family, passed away two years ago. I now live with my mother and sister and I am the first person in my family to attend University. My sister has completed her high school certificate. However she cannot pursue further studies due to financial constraints. My hobbies are writing, reciting poems and watching current affairs and talk shows.
 
I plan to graduate in 2014 and my dream is to obtain a PhD in Economics, to pay tuition fees for children who come from poor backgrounds and to build a shelter for orphans in my hometown. A Kiva loan will help to ensure my education continues uninterrupted, allowing me to achieve my goals.

video.title: Kiva Borrower Portia from South Africa

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

In 2011, Benie joined GDMPC and is now requesting a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. In the future, Benie wants to make improvements to his house and the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

Erlinda has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the dry goods store for seven years and earns additional income from raising pigs.

Erlinda aspires to save enough money to send her children to college

loans.name: Mildred

texts.es: Mildred es una joven de 22 años vive con su  conviviente el señor Jhery, viven en la casa de sus padres en la comunidad de la Maica central de la ciudad de Cochabamba, viven muy incomodos en una sola habitación donde duermen y cocinan, actualmente no tienen hijos pero viene un hijo en camino. Su principal actividad de Mildred es la producción de la leche cruda, donde el producto entrega a otra persona para su elaboración de quesillo así mismo se dedica a la cría y venta de cerdos a pesar de su embarazo  trabaja muy duro para poder sobrevivir ya que no cuenta con el apoyo de sus padres, el esposo trabaja prestando servicios de chapería. El destino del crédito es para la compra de una cabeza de ganado lechero, con lo cual incrementara la cantidad de leche y por lo tanto mejorara sus ingresos. Entre sus sueños y mentas de Mildred es reunir dinero para poder comprar un lote de terreno y construir su propia casa y de esa manera ofrecer un mejor nivel de vida a su hijo que viene en camino.
texts.en:
Mildred is a young woman of 22, and lives with her partner Jhery. They live in his parents house in the community of Maica Central, near the city of Cochabamba.

They live very inconveniently in a single room where they sleep and cook. Currently they don't have children, but a child is on the way. Mildred's main livelihood is the production of raw milk, where she delivers the product to another person, for the making of quesillo (soft cheese). As well, she raises and sells pigs. 

Despite her pregnancy, she works very hard to be able to survive, as she doesn't have the support of her parents. Her husband does auto body work.

The loan is earmarked for the purchase of a dairy cow, through which she will increase the amount of milk and therefore improve her income. 

One of Mildred's dreams is to save up the money to buy a piece of land and build their own house, and in that way offer a better standard of living to their child who is on the way.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: 040133 Giang Sơn - Hoằng Trường-Hoằng Hoá Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hương, a 30-year-old married mother of two residing in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province, is the leader of a five-member group, the 040133 Giang Sơn - Hoằng Trường-Hoằng Hoá solidarity group. For more than 10 years, Hương has operated a fishing enterprise that supports two dependents. Her main business hardships are natural disasters and droughts.

In 2006, Hương joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business, and has borrowed and repaid six loans thus far. She is now requesting a loan to purchase a new fishing net.

In the future, Hương hopes to buy land of her own, earn enough money to provide for her children, and enable her business to continue to do well.

loans.use: to purchase a fishing net.

loans.name: Gantsetseg

texts.en: Mrs.Gantsetseg aged 30, lives with her husband and a son in a small state apartment  in Govisumber province. Her husband has been working as a repairman in the state department of Mongolian railway for 5 years.  Her son is 7 years old and goes to the secondary school. Before Mrs.Gantsetseg worked as a teacher in a kindergarden of the World Vision INGO. In this year, she is started her first own business to sell silver articles. But her income was  insufficient. Therefore, she also sells bed linens and her income increased two times. Now she is requesting a 2.000.000 MNT to improve the working capital and to increase a range of goods. Her next plan is to build her private shop.

loans.use: To improve the working capital and to increase a range of goods

loans.name: Alijon

texts.en: Alijon is a very clever boy. He graduated school with excellence and good marks. He was one of the best pupils of his school. He likes math, computers, geography and other subjects. His hobby is playing football. His classmates like him very much. This year he has entered to the Economic University.  His parents are workers. Their income is small to pay for Alijon’s study at the university. Alijon wants to be one of the best economists in his town. He is purposeful and hardworking. Please, help him to realize his dream. He is asking for a loan of 950 USD to pay for study at the university. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To pay for study at the university

Evelyn has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future, Evelyn hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more dresses to sell.

Cecilio has been a new member of PMPC. In the future, Cecilio hopes to expand his business.

She requested a loan of 15,000 to purchase fertilizers such as manure. In 20090, Shiela joined GDMPC. In the future, Shiela wants to make improvements of her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.name: Virginia

Virginia is 59 years old and lives in Becor Taboo, Jimenez. Virginia is married with 4 children. 
Virginia works in the fish industry and sells fish for a living. Virginia has been doing this for 6 years. Virginia has requested a loan of 8000 to purchase additional fish to sell.
Virginia has been a member of PMPC for 6 years. In the future,Virginia hopes to save in case of emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to sell

loans.name: Omar

texts.es:
El señor Omar esta recién casado y por medio de una familiar le otorgo una vivienda el cual le están haciendo falta varias mejorar, es por eso que solicita el préstamo y realizar los acabados del exterior.
El señor Omar es maestro de Ingles de una primaria  del gobierno y su esposa  también es maestrea de un colegio particular, son los ingresos que tiene para formar su patrimonio juntos y mejor la calidad de vida, ya que pronto se unirá un miembro mas a la familia, pronto llegara un bebe a la familia.
Desea mejorar el patrimonio donde llagara su pequeño hijo.
texts.en:
Omar married recently and through a relative he was provided housing which he is improving in many ways, and this is why he is asking for a loan to finish the exterior. 

Omar is an English teacher at a government primary school and his wife is also a teacher at a private school. They are putting their incomes together so their assets will provide a better quality of life, as soon they will be joined by another member to their family, as a new baby is on the way.

He wants to improve the home as his son will be arriving,

loans.use: to finish work on the outside of his home

loans.name: Maria Marleny

texts.es:
Maria se encuentra casada y tiene 1 hijo de 17 años de edad, y debido a que los ingresos que genera su esposo no son suficientes para poder sostener todos los gastos de su hogar y también brindarle una educación de buena calidad a su hijo, decidió montar una tienda general donde ofrece productos de la canasta familiar y gracias a la cual puede contribuir económicamente en su hogar para que puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida. Desde hace 6 años que montó su tienda las condiciones económicas en su hogar han mejorado y las dificultades que constantemente presentaban se han venido superando poco a poco, y a pesar de que su negocio le brinda estas ventajas, aún no cuenta con el capital suficiente para poderle ofrecer a su hijo el acceso a una educación universitaria; es por esto que sigue trabajando fuertemente todos los días para que su negocio crezca y le permita obtener mayores ingresos y así brindarle esta oportunidad a su hijo. Su mayor dificultad es que no cuenta con un gran capital para mantener surtida su tienda, por esto Maria busca un préstamo para comprar productos de la canasta familiar y surtir su tienda con productos que ya se han ido agotando.

Su sueño es tener un negocio grande y próspero donde pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas y con el cual tenga la oportunidad de brindar a su esposo y su hijo una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en: Maria is married and has a seventeen year old son.  Since the income her husband earns is not sufficient to pay for the household expenses and also provide their son with a good quality education, she decided to open a general store where she sells staple goods.  Thanks to her business, she is able to contribute financially to the home so that they can have a better quality of life.  Since she opened her store six years ago, the economic situation in her home has improved and she has gradually overcome the constant difficulties that she had.  However, even though her business provides these advantages, she still doesn’t have enough resources to be able to offer her son access to a college education.  In order to provide her son with his opportunity, she continues working hard every day so that her business grows and allows her to earn higher income.  Her greatest difficulty is she doesn’t have enough capital to keep her store stocked.  For this reason, Maria is requesting a loan to purchase staple goods and stock her store with products that have been depleted.

loans.use: to purchase staple goods and stock her store with products that have been depleted.

loans.name: Joeperlie

Joeperlie is 47 years old and married with three children.

Joeperlie works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell in her general store.

Joeperlie has borrowed and repaid 17 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and earns additional income from farming rice.

Joeperlie aspires to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.name: Genevie

texts.en:
Genevie is married with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Genevie is 36 years old. Both of her children are in school.

Genevie has a food vending business in the Philippines. Genevie requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her business.

Genevie has been in this business for seven years.  In the future, Genevie would like to save enough to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Alberta

texts.es:
La señora Alberta y su esposo tienen dos hijas a quienes les quieren dar los estudios necesarios para que puedan ser unas triunfadoras y tengan un prometedor futuro.
Solicitan el préstamo para poder pagar las colegiaturas y comprar los útiles escolares ya que por el momento no cuentan con el dinero necesario para cubrir esta necesidad escolar que sus hijas necesitan. 
La señora Alberto y su esposo son empleados de una maquiladora en el aria de producción, son los ingresos que tiene para solventar los gastos y con el cual cubrirán el pago del crédito.
texts.en: Alberta and her husband have two daughters to whom they want to provide the necessary education so that they can be successful and have a promising future. They request the loan to pay for tuition fees and school supplies, since at the moment they don't have the amount of money to cover this need their daughters have. Alberta and her husband are employees of an assembly plant, and they work in the production area. That is the income they have to pay expenses and to repay the loan.

loans.use: to pay for school expenses

loans.name: Honorata

texts.en:
Honorata is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a variety store business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 22,000 through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell.

NWTF is posting this new loan request for Honorata's business in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to sell.

loans.name: 040124 Giang Sơn - Hoằng Trường-Hoằng Hoá Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Tươi operates a business catching fish. She is requesting a loan to purchase net to catch fish.

Tươi is 37 years old and she is married with two children.

She is the leader of a four-member group, the 040124 Giang Sơn - Hoằng Trường-Hoằng Hoá solidarity group. Tươi supports two dependents with her business in the Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2012, Tươi joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Tươi has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Tươi has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Tươi faces in her business is the lack of labor help.

In the future, Tươi hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and for her to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase net to catch fish.

loans.name: Edgar Marino

texts.es:
Edgar anteriormente vivía en su municipio natal y allí trabajó durante 8 años para una empresa de fotografía. Cuando conoció a la que hoy es su esposa, decidió trasladarse para la ciudad a vivir con ella y quiso aprovechar los conocimientos que ya tenía en la actividad y así montó su propio negocio donde ofrece el servicio de fotografía y también tiene una venta de productos de uso personal. Gracias a este negocio, la calidad de vida en su hogar ha venido mejorando y cada vez más sus hijos pueden tener mejores oportunidades. Buscando incrementar sus ventas, Edgar busca un préstamo para comprar una estantería donde pueda ubicar sus productos y así aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes.

Su sueño es que este negocio siga creciendo y este le de las condiciones económicas para que sus hijos puedan acceder a una educación universitaria, además de que les permita seguir teniendo una buena calidad de vida en su hogar y tener mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en: Edgar was previously living in his hometown municipality, and worked there for eight years for a photography company. When he met who is now his wife, he decided to move to the city to live with her and wanted to take advantage of the knowledge he already had in the activity, so he set up his own business where he offers photography services, and also sells personal use products. Thanks to this business, the quality of life at his home has been improving, and his children have better opportunities. Looking to increase his sales, Edgar is requesting a loan to buy a display cabinet where he can place his products and therefore increase the variety of products he can offer to his customers. His dream is for this business to continue growing and provide him with the financial conditions to allow his children to access a college education, apart from allowing them to keep enjoying a good standard of living at home and better financial opportunities to progress.

loans.use: to buy a display cabinet where he can place his products and therefore increase the variety of products he can offer to his customers

loans.name: Hafiza

texts.ru: Хафизе 34 лет. Она  трудолюбивая женщина, но семейное счастье не открыла свои двери для нее. Она в разводе с мужем и сама воспитывает  двоих детей. Дети еще маленькие. В основном она  занимается скотоводством. Уже более 6 лет он занимается этим бизнесом, так как, после развода у нее не было поддержки. Ее отец  Ахмад  помогает советами  в ведении бизнеса. В дальнейшем она хочет, расширит свой бизнес и поэтому запросила кредит для покупки скота.   Доход от бизнеса она хочет  потратить на  учебу своих детей. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Hafiza is 34 years old. She is a hardworking woman, but family happiness has not opened its doors to her. She is divorced from her husband and raises two children by herself. The children are still young. 

Hafiza mainly works with livestock breeding. She has been engaged in this business for more than six years, since she after the divorce did not have any support. Her father, Akhmad, helps with advice on running the business.

Hafiza would like to expand her business in the future, and therefore requested a loan for the purchase of livestock. She wants to save the income from the business for her children's education. She hopes for your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Marrieta

texts.en:
Marrieta is married with three children. Marrieta is 53 years old and lives in Poblacion, Sinacaban.

Marrieta is a farmer and raises pigs to earn a living. Marrieta has been doing this for eight years. Marrieta has requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to purchase additional feeds.

Marrieta has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Marrieta hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional feed for her pigs

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
For over three years in Dicoloc, Jimenez, Rosita, a 47-year-old married mother of three children, has made a living through the operation of a general store selling a variety of food and home use products. She earns 4,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2011, Rosita joined GDMPC. She is now requesting a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase new items such as candies, milo, shampoo, soaps etc. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as candies, milo, shampoo, soaps etc.

loans.name: Futuro Y Esperanza Group

texts.es:
Este Banco Comunal se llama “Futuro y Esfuerzo” está conformado por 17 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran; bazar, venta de juguetes, repostería, librería, venta de verduras, venta de ropa, costuras, venta de fruta seca, servicios entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Osorno.
Romina delegada del grupo del Banco Comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra de pies, ocupando el segundo lugar de izquierda a derecha, viste una polera de color café y encima lleva puesto un chaleco de color negro, su cabello es de color oscuro y lo usa suelto.
Ella se dedica al rubro de venta de ropa usada y venta de accesorios varios como pinches, peluches, desde hace 7 años. Comenta que trabaja los días sábados en una feria de 10ºº a 14ºº horas, los demás días se dedica a vender productos de belleza por catalogo.
La mercadería que va necesitando para la venta de su negocio se la envían por encomienda desde la ciudad de Santiago, ya que en Santiago tiene la posibilidad de comprar en gran cantidad a bajo costo, por lo tanto conveniente económicamente.
Con el crédito comprará ropa de casa como cubrecamas y sabanas y artículos para la temporada del mes de  septiembre como volantines.
Una de las metas de Romina es seguir creciendo y tener un local, donde atienda de manera más cálida a su clientela, así con esto optar a una mejor calidad de vida.
Romina vive junto a su madre y su hijo de 4 años de edad. Sus sueños son agrandar su negocio ya que tiene la necesidad de contar con más recursos en el hogar, porque los hijos van creciendo y al mismo tiempo crece la necesidad de darles un buen pasar y un buen futuro.
Ella se encuentra muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le permitirá invertir en su negocio. Respecto al grupo del Banco Comunal del cual forma parte, comenta que en éste existe muy buena comunicación. Por otro lado las capacitaciones, le han servido para aprender nuevas estrategias de venta y contabilidad.
Osorno es una ciudad que se ubica en la zona sur de Chile, región de Los Lagos. Es un importante centro agropecuario que se identifica como "La Patria de la Leche y Tierra de la Carne" de Chile. Dentro de su actividad agropecuaria se destaca el cultivo de trigo y avena, la crianza de ganado, para el procesamiento de carnes y lácteos además de la fabricación de equipos agrarios.
Destaca en Osorno el único estadio de fútbol techado de Chile, el Estadio Municipal "Rubén Marcos”.
texts.en: This communal bank is called 'Futuro y Esfuerzo' ('Future and Effort') and is made up of 17 entrepreneurs who have various types of businesses, among which: bazaar, toy shop, bakery, bookshop, vegetable shop, clothes shop, sewing, dried fruit shop, services. All of them live in the town of Osorno. Romina is one of the members: in the picture, she is the second standing person from the left (she is the one wearing a brown top with a black cardigan, with black, untied hair). She has been selling used clothing and various accessories such as pins or stuffed animals for seven years. She says that she does that on Saturdays at a market stall from 10 to 14, and that on the other days of the week she sells beauty products from a catalogue. She receives the merchandise she needs for her business in packages from the city of Santiago, since if she buys wholesale from there, she can benefit from lower prices, which is an advantage. With the loan, Romina will buy house linens such as bedclothes and sheets, as well as seasonal articles that sell well in September, such as kites. One of her goals is to keep growing and have a shop, which would be more welcoming for customers, and hopefully provide her with a better quality of life. Romina lives with her mother and her son, who is four years old. Her dream to have a shop is to prepare for her son growing up and her needing more income to help him have a good life and a good future. She is very grateful for the opportunity afforded to her by field partner Fondo Esperanza, because it will help her invest in her business. Concerning her communal bank, she says that there is very good communication within it. Furthermore, the training courses it gives have enabled her to learn new sales strategies and accounting practices. Osorno is a city located in the south of Chile, in the region of Los Lagos ('the lakes'). It is an important agricultural centre, boasting to be 'the home of the milk, the land of the meat' of Chile. Its principal agricultural activities are growing sweetcorn and oats, rearing cattle (for milk and meat), and manufacturing agricultural equipment. The main landmark of the town is the only covered football stadium in the country, the municipal stadium 'Rubén Marcos'.

loans.use: to buy more house linens as well as seasonal items for September (kites).

loans.name: Jimmy Omar

texts.es:
Jimmy Omar tiene 20 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con el hermano y la madre en Ventanas provincia de los ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC LA UNION, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Frías, Perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol.

Jimmy Omar se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y además cría animales como pollos y cerdos para después venderlos, Las compras y las ventas de los productos agrícolas lo hace en ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas de maíz, comprar productos cómo urea, liquidos mata maleza, abonos agrícolas. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar productos agrícolas. El sueño es seguir trabajando para tener más ingresos.

En el tiempo libre le gusta salir de paseo.
texts.en:
Jimmy Omar is 20 years old. He is single with no children. He lives with his brother and his mother in Ventanas, in the province of Los Ríos.

He is a member of the Union Communal Bank located in Recinto Aguas Frías, belonging to the canton of Ventanas. The members of this communal bank are dedicated to growing corn, rice, and beans.

Jimmy Omar works in agriculture planting corn and he also raises animals such as chickens and pigs and later sells them. The buying and selling of agricultural products take place in Ventanas.

He is asking for a loan to buy corn seeds, and to buy products such as urea, liquid weedkiller, and fertilizer. Through this loan he will be able to buy farming supplies. His dream is to continue working in order to have more income.

In his free time he likes to go for a walk.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds and products such as urea, liquid weedkiller, and fertilizer

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
María tiene 56 años de edad, vive en casa propia junto a sus cuatro hijos, quienes ya son mayores de edad y le ayuda a trabajar siembras de maíz y la crianza de ganado, de esta actividad logra mantener a su familia.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de abono y herbicidas también el pago de mozos, para iniciar la siembra, este préstamo le brindara una mayor seguridad en poder tener una mejor condición para aumentar la producción en sus cultivos.

El objetivo de ella es mejorar económicamente con su familia, a través del esfuerzo que realiza a diario en agricultura, manteniendo todo lo necesario para sus hijos.
texts.en: María is 56 years old, she lives in a house of her own, together with her four children who are of legal age and help her work the lands, sowing corn and raising cattle; activities which support the family. She is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and herbicides, and also to pay for labor, to start the sowing. This loan will make her more confident of being able to be in a better condition to improve the production. Her goal is to improve her family's financial situation through the hard work she does on a daily basis in agricultural activities, providing everything that is necessary for her children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, herbicides and pay for labor

loans.name: Enkhtsetseg

texts.en: Mrs. Enkhtsetseg, 54, is retired, but she still has been working as an accountant for seven years at a beverage company. Now, she lives with her husband, all three of her children, and moved out from their parent’s home in the ger district (a ger is a traditional nomadic yurt or small house) in Kherlen, which is an eastern city in Mongolia. This is her second loan. The first one was used for the initial construction of her house in her backyard, but the construction was stopped recently due to a money shortage. There are still some things that need to be done, such as insulate the walls. So, she is requesting a loan to purchase wall insulation materials such as foam, cement, rock, wool, and some other items so that her family can finish building their house before winter. She hopes that having walls with insulation will reduce their usage of coal.

loans.use: To purchase wall insulation materials such as foam, cement, rock, wool, and some other items so that her family can finish building their house before winter

loans.name: Abdurahmon

texts.ru: Абдурахмон замечательный человек с хорошим чувством юмором и настойчивым характером. Его личные достоинства помогают ему быть успешным в бизнесе и в жизни. У него очень хорошая жена. На воспитании они имеют двоих детей. Им 13 и 16 лет. С целью обеспечения семьи Абдурахмон  15 лет тому назад организовал свой бизнес скотоводством и земледелием. В основном он выращивает картофель, пшеницу и другие сельхоз продукты. Его жена помогает ему в ведении бизнеса. Абдурахмон хочет развивать бизнес и для этого запрашивает кредит на сумму 4000 сомони для покупки скота. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Abdurahmon is a wonderful man with a good sense of humor and persistent nature. His personal dignity helps him to be successful in business and in life. He has a very good wife. They are raising two children, who are 13 and 16 years old. 

With an aim to provide for the family, Abdurahmon established his business of livestock breeding and agriculture 15 years ago. He mainly grows potatoes, wheat and other agricultural products. His wife helps him with running the business. 

Abdurahmon would like to expand his business. He is therefore requesting a loan in the amount of 4,000 somoni for the purchase of livestock. He is waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Luz Maryody

texts.es:
Luz Maryody se encuentra casada y tiene 3 hijos, y para generar los ingresos del hogar tiene junto con su esposo una tienda de ropa donde ofrece prendas de vestir a sus clientes y gracias a la cual han logrado sacar adelante su familia. El negocio viene de trascendencia familiar y es con este que han podido generar los ingresos en su hogar, de modo que sus hijos han tenido la oportunidad de tener acceso a una educación de mejor calidad. Gracias a este negocio, sus dificultades económicas y las de su familia han venido siendo superadas poco a poco, y espera seguir creciendo para poder tener una mejor calidad de vida en su hogar. Debido a que tiene muy buenas ventas pero no cuenta con un capital suficiente para poder responder a estas, Luz Maryody busca un préstamo para comprar ropa y surtir su almacén con prendas de vestir que ya se han ido agotando.

Su mayor sueño es sacar este negocio adelante y que este le permita seguir brindándoles a sus 3 hijos el acceso a una educación de buena calidad.
texts.en: Luz Maryody is married and has three children. In order to meet household expenses, she and her husband run a clothes shop together, thanks to which they have managed to make a living for their family. The shop is inherited, and thanks to the earnings it brings, their children were able to have a better education. Thanks to the shop, the family's financial difficulties have been diminishing, and the couple hopes to keep growing to have an even better quality of life. Given that they make very good sales but have not enough capital to re-stock accordingly, Luz Maryody seeks a loan to buy clothes to sell in her shop, since her stock is running low. Her greatest dream is to really make this business of theirs grow in order to continue to be able to afford a good education for her children.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell, since her stock is running low.

loans.name: Erdenedelger

texts.en: Mrs. Erdenedelger, 38, runs a second-hand clothes business in an outdoor market of Ulaanbaatar, the capital of Mongolia. For seven years she has been selling clothes. In the summertime, she sells t-shirts and bags, and in the winter, she sells jackets, coats, etc. Currently, she lives with her family in a ger, a Mongolian traditional nomadic yurt, in the ger district of Ulaanbaatar. Her family owns an old, small house in addition to their ger, but it was built with very bad walls. In the winter, their house suffers heat loss and emits fuel. So, she wants to repair her home before the winter. First of all, she plans to add insulation to the walls. The loan she is taking out will be dedicated to covering the cost of building materials to repair her house.

loans.use: To cover the cost of building materials to repair her house

loans.name: Anvarjon

texts.ru: Анварчон успешный бизнесмен в сфере скотоводства. Более 15 лет он занимается этим бизнесом. Он покупает корову, присматривает за ним и продает молоко соседям, а также он продает корову после нескольких месяцев. Его жена Малика  помогает ему в ведении бизнеса. На воспитании они имеют двоих детей. Они еще не совершеннолетние, старшему 15 лет, а младшему 14 лет. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми не обходимыми средствами, Анварчон хочет развивать свой бизнес. Он запрашивает кредит на сумму 750 долларов США для покупки коровы. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Anvarjon is a successful businessman in the area of livestock breeding. He has been engaged in this business for more than 15 years. He purchases a cow, watches over it and sells the milk to the neighbors, and then sells it after a few months.

Anvarjon's wife Malika helps him in running the business. They are raising two children. The children are not yet adults, the older one is 15 years old and the younger one 14 years old. 

Anvarjon would like to expand his business, with an aim to provide the family with all necessary means. He requests a loan in the amount of 750 US dollars for the purchase of cows. He waits for your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase cows

loans.name: Nicolasa

texts.es: Doña Nicolasa es una señora de 51 años tiene 2 hijos una de sus hijas ya logro terminar una carrera profesional Abogada actualmente está realizando sus prácticas y uno de hijos esta en colegio, su esposo actualmente se encuentra trabajando en España ha tenido que migrar a otro país por necesidad y para ofrecer un mejor nivel de vida para su familia, y gracias a las remesas que envía su marido lograron construir un casa nueva, viven en la comunidad de la Maica de la ciudad de Cochabamba su principal actividad es la producción de la leche cruda, el producto vende a su madre para la elaboración de quesillo, el destino del crédito es para la compra de forraje, ya que la cliente desea acumular bastante forraje para la temporada de sequía y de esa manera seguir con  la misma alimentación del ganado con lo cual continuaran produciendo la misma cantidad de leche. Entre sus sueños y mentas es seguir creciendo en su actividad lechero hasta tener una pequeña granja de por lo menos 30 cabezas de ganado, la señora Nicolasa también sueña en ver pronto  a su marido a su lado para que puedan estar juntos.
texts.en: Nicolasa is fifty-one and has two children. Her daughter managed to graduate as a lawyer and is now doing an internship. Her son is at school and her husband is working in Spain. He had to emigrate to bring them all a better quality of life. Thanks to the money he sends home, they were able to build a new house. The family lives in the neighbourhood of Maica in the town of Cochabamba; Nicolasa's main activity is the production of raw milk. She sells it to her mother, who makes cheese. The loan is to buy forage in order to have enough in stock to face the dry season. That would enable her to continue feeding her cows the same quantities of forage, so that they, in turn, produce the same quantity of milk. One of her dreams and goals is to see her business continue growing until it boasts at least thirty cows. But perhaps Nicolasa's dearest dream of all is to see her husband return home so that they can be together.

loans.use: to buy forage for her cows.

loans.name: Abdulatif

texts.ru: Абдулатиф 58 лет. Он женат. Ее жену зовут Шарофат. Абдулатиф и Шарофат имеют на воспитании одного ребенка.Ему 18 лет. Абдулатиф обеспечивает свою семью с дохода, который он получает от своего бизнеса. Более 25 лет он занимается скотоводством, а также он занимается выращиванием овощей, как картофель. Его жена помогает ему в ведении бизнеса. Абдулатиф запрашивает кредит на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки скота. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Abdulatif is 58 years old. He is married. His wife is called Sharofat. Abdulatif and Sharofat are raising a child. He is 18 years old. 

Abdulatif provides for his family with income that he receives from his business. He has been engaged in livestock breeding for more than 25 years, and he also works with growing vegetables, like potatoes. His wife helps him with his business. 

Abdulatif requests a loan in the amount of 3,000 somoni for the purchase of livestock. He waits for your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Julio

texts.es: Julio con su anterior crédito compró medicamentos, como antinflamatorios, antihistamínicos, antibióticos y jarabes gripales; con su negocio bien surtido logró un incremento en sus ventas y eso se   debió a su credikiva. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, con el cual comprará medicamentos especialmente para hacer terapia y cosméticos que agregará a su oferta. Con su nuevo credikiva logrará incremental su capital de trabajo y hacer compras en mayor volumen, que el acostumbrado, y obtendrá descuentos por productos que le dejan un importante margen de ganancias.  Julio envía un mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva: “Gracias por su solidaridad y apoyo al sector microempresarial con su ayuda he logrado salir adelante
texts.en:
Julio used his previous loan to purchase medicines such as anti-inflammatory drugs, antihistamines, antibiotics, and flu syrup.  With his business well stocked, Julio managed to increase his sales as a direct result of his Kiva loan.  He is currently applying for a new Kiva loan, which he will use to purchase medicines, especially those used for therapy and cosmetics, so he can increase his supply.  Julio’s new Kiva loan will allow him to gradually increase his working capital and to make purchases in larger quantities than he normally does—this, in turn, will allow him to get discounts on products, which will provide him with a significant profit margin.  

Julio sends a message to Kiva lenders: “Thank you for your solidarity and your support to the microenterprise sector.  With your help I have managed to get ahead.”

loans.use: to purchase medicines, especially those used for therapy and cosmetics, so he can increase his supply.

loans.name: Gankhuyag

texts.en: Mr. Gankhuyag, 44, sells second-hand clothes in an outdoor bazaar in Ulaanbaatar, which is the capital city of Mongolia. He has been operating his business for three years. He lives with his wife and two children in his ground-floor apartment that has two rooms. He keeps his stock in one of the rooms, and it is not very spacious for storing clothes. Currently, his family is using just one other room, and everything is crowded. His apartment was built in the early 1980s, and it has not undergone renovations in many years. In the winter, it suffers heat loss through its windows and wall corners, and the ceilings are frosted. Usually, he uses a coal or wood-fired stove in his kitchen to warm his home and dry out the moisture inside the rooms. He knows that it is very harmful to the health of his family members and the environment. So, he decided to make some repairs to his apartment. First, he will need to buy wall insulation materials such as foam, silicon, cement, and other building materials to make renovations to his old apartment. In addition, he plans to extend his apartment by adding one more room.

loans.use: To buy wall insulation materials such as foam, silicon, cement, and other building materials to make renovations to his old apartment

loans.name: Altantuya

texts.en:
Altantuya is 40 years old and a manager in the private company. She is a female head of a household and lives with her three children in her house in the ger district, which is made up of traditional Mongolian nomadic yurts and few houses in boundary of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. 

Her family moved into their current house in 2009; it was built many years ago. Since she bought her house, there have not been any repairs or renovation. Her house has heat loss or emission through its thin walls and windows. In winter her three children usually get sick because it is chilly at home. She uses a coal-fired furnace to heat her home, and it creates too much smoke inside and outside of house.  

Therefore she is keen to make repairs and insulate the walls by bricks and such other building materials. The loan she is asking will be used to buy the building materials and cover the cost of hiring workers for her house repair.

loans.use: To buy building materials and cover the cost of hiring workers for house repairs.

loans.name: Shagufta

texts.en:
Mrs Shagufta is 41 years old and married. She is running her general store with the support of her husband. She understands that if her husband works only for their family, they will not be able to earn so much to meet the expenses of their household. 

She extended her business by purchasing an ice cream machine.  Now she needs loan of Rs. 40,000 to purchase more items for her store, including rice, sugar, oil, milk, and other grocery items in bulk from markets. 

She then would be able to manage increasing demand efficiently and hence better support her family.

loans.use: To purchase more items for her store, including rice, sugar, oil, milk, and other grocery items in bulk.
